content.rendered:
Joseph is a self-motivated individual with outstanding organizational, time-management and leadership expertise. With over 10 years extensive experience of working in teaching and a customer-focused learning environment, he has experience dealing with a wide range of customers and organizations whilst using his in-depth knowledge of financial accounting, business studies, management, and auditing. He has a proven problem solver and team-player, able to work well in a pressure driven environment. He has a passion for motivating his students to be the best and beat the best.  His hobby is singing and he always likes to be happy and create a joyful atmosphere, no matter what the circumstances are.

Joseph is currently a HND lecturer at Regent College London. He is responsible for lecturing various HND business units, level 4 and 5 students. These units include Financial Reporting, Management Accounting, Business and Business Environment, Management & Operation, Entrepreneurial and Small Business management, Innovation and Commercialisation. He is also responsible for given both formative and summative feedback to students, interviewing prospective students for admission, providing academic support to students.

Courses Taught

  • HND in Business
